feed.title: Category: Metal Gear Solid 2: Digital Graphic Novel | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Metal Gear Solid 2: Digital Graphic Novel (PSP, 2008)
entry.content: I watched the Metal Gear Solid 2: Digital Graphic Novel. It was really cool. The changed the flow of the story a lot and a lot of the details for the adventure, but it got to the same place. It was neat, and a good reminder before playing MGS4 (which I am doing right now.)
